Package org.digijava.kernel.ampapi.endpoints.security

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionAuthorizer
    Authorizes current API request based on the given set of required actions
    ApiAuthentication
    Created by esoliani on 13/06/16.
    AuthorizerResourceFilterFactory
    Factory for resource and sub-resource method filters for authorization purposes.
    Security
    This class should have all security / permissions related methods
    SecurityConstants
    Security Constants
    SecurityErrors
    Defines security specific errors
    SecurityService
    Security Endpoint related services like menu, footer, user
    UsersTest  
    WorkspaceMemberTest  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AuthRule
    Usual set of actions that must be authorized in order to execute an API call
